GSD.description:
ext4: fix error handling in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit 1b6762ecdf3cf12113772427c904aa3c420a1802. For more details please see the references link.
